content.raw:
Based on the description in the Challenge Rules, I would expect jumping to checkpoint 3 would mean the dish is now at the correct pitch angle:

Task 1 checkpoints:

1. Move within 1 meter of the communication dish.

2. Move the communication dish to the correct pitch angle.

3. Move the communication dish to the correct yaw angle.

4. Walk into the finish box.

Regarding implementation of actually allowing either of checkpoint 2 or 3 to come first... best of luck!
content.html:
Based on the description in the Challenge Rules, I would expect jumping to checkpoint 3 would mean the dish is now at the correct pitch angle:

Task 1 checkpoints:

  1. Move within 1 meter of the communication dish.

  2. Move the communication dish to the correct pitch angle.

  3. Move the communication dish to the correct yaw angle.

  4. Walk into the finish box.

Regarding implementation of actually allowing either of checkpoint 2 or 3 to come first... best of luck!
